name: Space Miner [alpha]
description:
Quick! Scan the star system, gather resources for the Mother Ship and try to stay alive, before they catch up.

The Mother Ship is on the run from the malicious Kel'Gorthian starfleet, and now that her warp drive is fully depleted, it comes down to you, the pilot of a small mining vessel, to search for the resources that will enable to survival of the human race.

Drift around the beta-21 star system mining asteroids, visiting planetoids and trying to keep your craft in one piece.


DISCLAIMER: This game is its early stages of development and far from done. This page will be updated soon with a more stable version.
